name: Confrapar
overview:
Confrapar invests in technology companies through Brazilian regulated (CVM) funds, with a diverse range of limited partners, including family offices, pension funds, banks and development agencies, from Brazil and abroad. We have already invested BRL 75 million in eight tech companies. Confrapar has offices in São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Belo Horizonte and Curitiba, the main Brazilian tech hubs.

Confrapar relies on the background and experience of its more than 80 Market Partners in the industries of technology, media and telecommunications, opening good opportunities for the portfolio companies and helping to grow the businesses.

Daily contact with Brazilian tech business reinforces the belief that Brazil holds excellent opportunities for long-term investors.

offices.address1: Alameda da Serra, 322, sala 201, Nova Lima

funds.name: HorizonTI
funds.source_description: Fundo HorizonTI da Confrapar: 40 milhoes em Investimento para Minas Gerais

funds.source_description: NascenTI: Confrapar lança fundo de R$ 35 milhoes para investir em TI no Rio de Janeiro
